data.name: つんつんVR / TSUN-TSUN VR
data.detailed_description:
【The World's First!! The VR where you really "feel" the touch by a girl.】
"TSUN-TSUN VR" has come to STEAM!

In TSUN-TSUN VR, you can feel as if you are really poked by a girl.
Through the realistic touch experience, we realized the most immersive experience ever.
Adding new possibility to the conventional VR experience!!

By wearing the suit that actually reacts to the point you are poked, please enjoy TSUN-TSUN experience with Katsuki chan.

And it is compatible VRM models. When the users makes their own original character by certain 3D modeling software, and outputs it as a VRM file, they can enjoy their character's poke.
It will be supported by the characters made by V-Katsu in the near future.

※Notice※
To fully enjoy this content, you need the haptics feedback vest named "TACTOT" by bHaptics.inc.
data.about_the_game:
【The World's First!! The VR where you really "feel" the touch by a girl.】
"TSUN-TSUN VR" has come to STEAM!

In TSUN-TSUN VR, you can feel as if you are really poked by a girl.
Through the realistic touch experience, we realized the most immersive experience ever.
Adding new possibility to the conventional VR experience!!

By wearing the suit that actually reacts to the point you are poked, please enjoy TSUN-TSUN experience with Katsuki chan.

And it is compatible VRM models. When the users makes their own original character by certain 3D modeling software, and outputs it as a VRM file, they can enjoy their character's poke.
It will be supported by the characters made by V-Katsu in the near future.

※Notice※

data.short_description: The world of Ready Player One has finally come! In TSUN-TSUN VR, you can feel as if you are really poked by a girl. Through the real touch experience, TSUN-TSUN VR has realized the most immersive experience ever.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows7 / 8.1 / 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 4590
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 980 or GTX 1070 or better/ AMD R9 290 or better
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
